segments.text: Don't remind me of that . This would be the last time I cut any classes for a basketball game .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on . Don't be so hard on yourself . Enjoy your life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just can't help it . Oh , look at Clive , he is really a big hit . They are definitely gonna win .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's only seven minutes into the game , too early to cheer up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , 18 points already , they are never gonna catch up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who knows ! It's a long game . Look ! That was a really nice shot !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thay are coming back to narrow the gap .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait , that guy , I know him . He is just a bench warmer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A secret weapon . They'd better set up the defense now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Clive is ready to explode . Keep your eyes open .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , man ! I can't believe it . A slam dunk !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good that he resembled his old , quick self .
segments.speaker: S2
